name: IBS Software Services (P)
overview:
IBS Software Services (P) Ltd. develops software for travel, transportation, hospitality, and logistics industries. It offers airline passenger management software products, which include aiRES for passenger reservations, inventory control, fares and ticketing, and departure control functions of the commercial airlines; iLoyal, a CRM and legacy system; iFly for value chains in the staff travel space; and Linx, which manages the services offered by charter airlines. The company also provides airline and airport operation products, such as Avient Fleet for performance and safety; Avient Crew for crew performance; TopAir, a flight operations system; and VISaer, an aircraft M and E solution. In addition, it offers iLogistics, a solution to manage and optimize the upstream logistics operations of oil and gas companies; iCargo, a cargo management system for cargo operations; and iCargoLite, a solution that supports the integrated management of cargo reservations and ground operations. Further, the company provides application development, application re-engineering, application maintenance, outsourced product development, technology consulting, business intelligence and data warehousing, independent verification and validation, legacy, and usability engineering services. The company serves airlines, cargo and logistics companies, and airports. IBS Software Services (P) Ltd. has a strategic partnership with IATA.

The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Trivandrum, India with additional offices in India, the United Arab Emirates, Hong Kong, the United Kingdom, Australia, Japan, the Netherlands, and Canada, as well as in the District of Columbia, Georgia, and Massachusetts.

funding_rounds.source_description: General Atlantic invests $60 mn in IBS Software
